answers.answer: Hi there,You are at high risk of developing type 2 diabetes, heart disease and stroke. Since you are at risk of developing diabetes it is advisable to adopt lifestyle changes. These will help you delay and even prevent the onset of full-blown diabetes. Weight management, daily exercising and having a balanced diet will be helpful. Consult your doctor about any more precautions you should be taking. Do keep me posted.Best luck and regards!
